mdRecord.dcterms:title: The grand drama of enchantment, called the 7 Castles of the passions, shich will shortly be produced, with new scenery by Mr. Thorne / Richmond Theatre, Managers, Messrs. J. Septon & W.H. Chippendale
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Richmond Theater (Richmond, Va.) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 folded sheet ([2] p.) ; 23 x 29 cm. fold. to 23 x 15 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed on p. [2]-[3] of one folded sheet; p. [1] and [4] are blank. [original]
Performance began on Tuesday, February 5, 1850, and continued for about a week according to the Richmond Enquirer. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of Robert Gooch. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond Theater (Richmond, Va.)
